title: What Exactly Are 'Monster Storms' And 'Bomb Cyclones'?
teaser: The northern U.S. is getting a blast of unseasonably cold weather, thanks to what has been dubbed a "bomb cyclone." The Washington Post's Jason Samenow explains that and other odd weather terms.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
